text: Sint Laurens is a village in the Dutch province of Zeeland. It is located in the municipality of Middelburg, about 3 km north of the city. == History == In 1816, the village of Brigdamme was merged into Sint Laurens. Sint Laurens remained a separate municipality until 1966, when it was merged with Middelburg. ==Gallery== File:St Laurens.jpg|Former seat of the local government File:Church Sint Laurens.JPG|Church of Sint Laurens ==References== ==External links== * Map of the former municipality, around 1868. title: Sint Laurens
